results.title: A Case of Severe Mitral Valve Regurgitation in a Patient with Leadless Pacemaker
results.text_hl: An 85-year-old man with cardiac history notable for @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@ diagnosed 10 years ago which was being treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Warfarin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014859 @@@warfarin@@@ presented to our institution with persistent @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@.

citations.NLM: Gumireddy SR, Katayama M, Chaliki HP. A Case of Severe Mitral Valve Regurgitation in a Patient with Leadless Pacemaker Case Rep Cardiol. 2020;2020():5389279. PMID: 32665866
citations.BibTeX: @article{32665866, title={A Case of Severe Mitral Valve Regurgitation in a Patient with Leadless Pacemaker}, author={Gumireddy SR and Katayama M and Chaliki HP}, journal={Case Rep Cardiol}, volume={2020}, pages={5389279}}

results.title: On-treatment HDL cholesterol predicts incident atrial fibrillation in hypertensive patients with left ventricular hypertrophy.
results.text_hl: Whether changing levels of HDL over time are more strongly related to the risk of new @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ has not been examined.Material and methods: Incident @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@ was examined in relation to baseline and on-treatment HDL levels in 8267 @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with no history of @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@, in sinus rhythm on their baseline electrocardiogram, randomly assigned to @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@- or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@-based treatment.

citations.NLM: Okin PM, Hille DA, Wachtell K, Kjeldsen SE, Julius S, Devereux RB. On-treatment HDL cholesterol predicts incident atrial fibrillation in hypertensive patients with left ventricular hypertrophy. Blood Press. 2020 Oct;29(5):319-326. PMID: 32586143
citations.BibTeX: @article{32586143, title={On-treatment HDL cholesterol predicts incident atrial fibrillation in hypertensive patients with left ventricular hypertrophy.}, author={Okin PM and Hille DA and Wachtell K and Kjeldsen SE and Julius S and Devereux RB}, journal={Blood Press}, volume={29}, number={5}, pages={319-326}}

results.title: Adverse effects of interactions between antipsychotics and medications used in the treatment of cardiovascular disorders.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: The highest number of interactions with antipsychotics was recorded among beta-blockers (n = 13, 25% of all cases), including @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@cardiac arrhythmias@@@ [@<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@ (n = 1): @CHEMICAL_Risperidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018967 @@@risperidone@@@ plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@; @DISEASE_Bradycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D001919 @@@bradycardia@@@ (n = 1): @CHEMICAL_Perphenazine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010546 @@@perphenazine@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@; @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@ventricular arrhythmias@@@: @CHEMICAL_sertindole @CHEMICAL_MESH:C066304 @@@sertindole@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ (n = 1) and @CHEMICAL_ziprasidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:C092292 @@@ziprasidone@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Sotalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013015 @@@sotalol@@@ (n = 3)] and @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ [@CHEMICAL_Chlorprothixene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002749 @@@chlorprotixene@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Nebivolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068577 @@@nebivolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ (n = 2)]. 12 cases concerned statins-@DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@myalgia@@@, @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@myopathy@@@, or creatine kinase elevation appeared after combination of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Haloperidol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006220 @@@haloperidol@@@ (n = 1), @CHEMICAL_Quetiapine_Fumarate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069348 @@@quetiapine@@@ (n = 3) or @CHEMICAL_Risperidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018967 @@@risperidone@@@ (n = 1), and @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Quetiapine_Fumarate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069348 @@@quetiapine@@@ (n = 5) or @CHEMICAL_Risperidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018967 @@@risperidone@@@ (n = 2).

citations.NLM: Siwek M, Woroń J, Gorostowicz A, Wordliczek J. Adverse effects of interactions between antipsychotics and medications used in the treatment of cardiovascular disorders. Pharmacol Rep. 2020 Apr;72(2):350-359. PMID: 32124390
citations.BibTeX: @article{32124390, title={Adverse effects of interactions between antipsychotics and medications used in the treatment of cardiovascular disorders.}, author={Siwek M and Woroń J and Gorostowicz A and Wordliczek J}, journal={Pharmacol Rep}, volume={72}, number={2}, pages={350-359}}

results.title: Beta-adrenoceptor blockers in atrial fibrillation: the importance of partial agonist activity.
results.text_hl: We have compared the effect of combining @CHEMICAL_Digoxin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004077 @@@digoxin@@@ (0.25 mg daily) with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ 50 mg and 100 mg or @CHEMICAL_Pindolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010869 @@@pindolol@@@ 5 mg twice daily and 15 mg twice daily in a cross-over randomised single-blind trial in eight symptomatic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (six male; mean age 62 years) with poorly controlled @<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@. 2.

citations.NLM: Channer KS, James MA, MacConnell T, Rees JR. Beta-adrenoceptor blockers in atrial fibrillation: the importance of partial agonist activity. Br J Clin Pharmacol. 1994 Jan;37(1):53-7. PMID: 7908532
